item.title: Early trade deadline questions: What's next for Giannis, Lakers and top contenders?
item.description: Early NBA trade deadline questions for Bucks, Lakers, Warriors and other top contenders, including biggest needs and what they can pull off.

item.title: Jimmy Butler, Steve Kerr and the Warriors' quest to solve the Jonathan Kuminga puzzle
item.description: Butler has taken on a mentorship role with Kuminga, who is still trying to find his role with the Warriors.

item.title: Projecting Round 1 of next year's NFL draft: Miller finds landing spots for 32 top prospects
item.description: How early could Ty Simpson go? What about Makai Lemon, David Bailey and Mansoor Delane? Let's project Round 1 of the 2026 draft -- plus two trades.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United eye highly rated Rennes duo
item.description: Manchester United are keeping tabs on Rennes duo Jérémy Jacquet and Mohamed Meite. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: $400 million extension, blockbuster trade or let it ride? MLB insiders break down Tigers' Tarik Skubal options
item.description: Will the best pitcher in baseball be on the move this offseason? Those in the game offer their advice.
